message: This offer takes into account the risk of inflation over the next 12 rounds. I propose a higher share for you in the first round to encourage cooperation early on.
This is my first offer. It's fair and accounts for the risk of inflation. I believe in starting with a good foundation for cooperation.
Considering the inflation, I've adjusted my offer to reflect the decreasing value of money. I aim for a more equitable distribution that still encourages trust and cooperation.
